name: My Website
info: This is my personal website. I wanted to create a fully responsive and interactive website where I can show my projects and let others get to know more about me. This is how it turned out.

name: Find Me Food
info: Find Me Food is an app that chooses a restaurant to eat at for you whether you are looking to try something new, just want to eat out, or having trouble choosing. This was my first Android App and is still a work in Progress with more features to come.

name: GitHub Profiles
info: This project is a continuation of a previous project called list github repos which listed GitHub repos in a nicely formatted way. GitHub Profiles is built on React and includes alot more features. GitHub Profiles allows you to search up a github user by their username and shows you thier profile info and their repos.
